text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires mentioning potential non-copyright routes, such as Passing Off or complaints to advertising regulators, if the ad suggests the author's endorsement. The candidate answer focuses almost entirely on copyright infringement (reproduction, adaptation, TDM exceptions) and provides extensive advice on copyright enforcement (C&D, litigation, damages).
